Field.Name: IGNORE_INCOMING_VID_ENABLE
Field.Description: If true, ignoring Incoming VID is being Enabled

Field.Name: LEARN_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable learning SA

Field.Name: LEARN_LIF_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable valid LIF in MACT payload upon learning

Field.Name: FWD_PORT_PROFILE
Field.Description: Map Port to Port profile in FWD context-selection

Field.Name: MAPPED_PP_PORT
Field.Description: Set always as CORE_ID and PORT_PP

Field.Name: VLAN_MEMBERSHIP_ENABLE
Field.Description: If true, VLAN membership per port is Enabled.

Field.Name: UNKNOWN_BC_DA_FILTER_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enabler for filtering of unknown broadcast Destination Address.

Field.Name: COS_MAP_PROFILE
Field.Description: Per PP Port Info: TC Map Profile.

Field.Name: UNKNOWN_MC_DA_FILTER_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enabler for filtering of unknown multicast Destination Address.

Field.Name: UNKNOWN_UC_DA_FILTER_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enabler for filtering of unknown unicast Destination Address.

Field.Name: SPLIT_HORIZON_ENABLE
Field.Description: Split Horizon Enable per Out PP Port.

Field.Name: RQP_DISCARD_ENABLE
Field.Description: RQP Discard Filter Enable per Out PP Port.

Field.Name: INVALID_OTM_ENABLE
Field.Description: Ivalid OTM Filter Enable per Out PP Port.

Field.Name: DSS_STACKING_ENABLE
Field.Description: DSS Stacking Filter Enable per Out PP Port.

Field.Name: LAG_MULTICAST_ENABLE
Field.Description: LAG Multicast Filter Enable per Out PP Port.

Field.Name: ERPP_SPLIT_HORIZON_ENABLE
Field.Description: ERPP Split Horizon Filter Enable per Out PP Port.

Field.Name: ACCEPTABLE_FRAME_TYPE_PROFILE
Field.Description: Egress Acceptable Frame Type Profile per Out PP Port.

Field.Name: ACCEPTABLE_FRAME_TYPE_ENABLE
Field.Description: Acceptable Frame Type Filter Enable per Out PP Port.

Field.Name: UNKNOWN_DA_ENABLE
Field.Description: Unknown DA Filter Enable per Out PP Port.

Field.Name: GLEM_PP_TRAP_ENABLE
Field.Description: GLEM PP Filter Enable per Out PP Port.

Field.Name: GLEM_NON_PP_TRAP_ENABLE
Field.Description: GLEM NON PP Filter Enable per Out PP Port.

Field.Name: TTL_SCOPING_ENABLE
Field.Description: TTL Scoping Filter Enable per Out PP Port.

Field.Name: TTL_ZERO_ENABLE
Field.Description: TTL Zero Filter Enable per Out PP Port.

Field.Name: TTL_ONE_ENABLE
Field.Description: TTL One Filter Enable per Out PP Port.

Field.Name: MTU_CHECK_ENABLE
Field.Description: MTU Ckeck Filter Enable per Out PP Port.

Field.Name: IPV4_FILTERS_ENABLE
Field.Description: IPV4 Filters Enable per Out PP Port.

Field.Name: IPV6_FILTERS_ENABLE
Field.Description: IPV6 Filters Enable per Out PP Port.

Field.Name: LAYER_4_FILTERS_ENABLE
Field.Description: Layer 4 Filters Enable per Out PP Port.

Field.Name: LATENCY_FLOW_PROFILE
Field.Description: end to end latency flow profile

AppDB.Name: ESEM_ACCESS_CMD_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Properties per ESEM access command. The access command is a port/LIF property.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_PTC_PORT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Ingress TM Port actions in Ingress PP blocks

Field.Name: FWD_PTC_PROFILE
Field.Description: Port profile used in FWD context-selection

Field.Name: VT_PTC_PROFILE
Field.Description: Map PTC to PTC profile at VT. Current target is only for vt1-3. It can't be used for vt4-vt5 due to native misleading processing

Field.Name: PRT_QUALIFIER_RAW
Field.Description: Using PRT Qualifier field to use as DB for parser

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_PP_RECYCLE_COMMAND
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Ingress Recycle command actions in Ingress PP blocks

AppDB.Name: PRT_QUALIFIER_INFO
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Properties of PRT Qualifier in Ingress PP blocks

Field.Name: KBR_VALID_BITMAP
Field.Description: KBR Valid Bitmap

Field.Name: PP_PORT_ENABLE
Field.Description: If it is set, PP Port is Enabled

Field.Name: TCAM_MODE_FULL_ENABLE
Field.Description: TCAM Mode Full Enable

Field.Name: LAYER_OFFSET
Field.Description: First layer offset

Field.Name: IGNORE_INCOMING_VID_ENABLE
Field.Description: If true, ignoring Incoming VID is being Enabled

Field.Name: VLAN_MEMBERSHIP_ENABLE
Field.Description: If true, VLAN membership check is Enabled.

AppDB.Name: PP_ATTRIBUTES_PER_TM_PORT_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: maps tm port to same interface enable

Field.Name: SAME_INTERFACE_ENABLE
Field.Description: Same Interface Enable per Out TM Port.

Field.Name: ERPP_VISIBILITY_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable(Allow) ERPP Visibility

Field.Name: ERPP_VISIBILITY_FORCE
Field.Description: Force(Enforce) ERPP Visibility, requires Enable

Field.Name: ETPP_VISIBILITY_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable(Allow) ETPP Visibility

Field.Name: ETPP_VISIBILITY_FORCE
Field.Description: Force(Enforce) ETPP Visibility, requires Enable

AppDB.Name: ETPP_MTU_PORT_INFO
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Enables MTU per port and sets MTU Profile for that port
